_header: When Jesu was in grave laid
_description: The story of the Resurrection — 605 lines in six-line stanzas (aabccb)

BodAsh61.First Lines:
When Ihesu was in graue leydThe bysschop vnto An oþer
                    seydThe best rede þat we can doneTo sir pylate we wyll
                    gone…
BodAsh61.Last Lines:
…God send hem grace to take þe weyTo þe blysse with
                    out endyng
BodAsh61.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Nachträge zu den Legenden 5: The Messengers of Death.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         79 (1887): 411-70: 441.
Shuffleton,  George. 
             Ashmole 61: A Compilation of Popular Middle English Verse.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008: 356-71; 564-9; 623-4.
